control.name: icbColorAlignment
control.description: This combo box allows the alignment of the preview color box to be specified.

control.name: icbColorText
control.description: This combo box allows you to specify the manner in which the selected color is displayed within the edit box.

control.name: ceShowColorDialog
control.description: This check box allows or prohibits displaying the color dialog when a custom color box is right-clicked.

control.name: ceAsInteger
control.description: This check box allows you to specify whether the editor stores the selected color as integer or as a System.Drawing.Color structure.

control.name: seAdd
control.description: Click this button to fill the user-defined colors in the Custom panel of the dropdown window with random colors.

control.name: seClear
control.description: Click this button to clear the user-defined colors in the Custom panel of the dropdown window.

hint.name: colorEditSample
hint.hinttext: #KeyboardALT+DOWN, F4 to show or hide the dropdown color picker
